para.ref: What license is clusterThis distributed under?
How can I contribute to clusterThis?

sect1.title: What is clusterThis?
sect1.para: The clusterThis mantra geometry instancing procedural DSO/OTL will instance geometry to incoming points and will process the point attributes in a number of ways for the instanced geometry. Delays geomtery instantiation until render time thus, reduces size of IFD file and network bandwidth, allows access to render time data, add additional detail to scene.

sect1.title: What license is clusterThis distributed under?
How can I contribute to clusterThis?
sect1.para: If you have bug reports or ideas for improvements or new features, please contact us!
